citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although the facility provides enrichment to the birds, they do not have an environmental enhancement plan documented
to promote the overall psychological well-being of birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow a
species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds that is within
industry standards and approved by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available for future inspections.
****Correct by April 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n
